blogPost.title: Great thread of influential immunology papers that weren't published in a "top" journal. What would you add to the list? https://t.co/qJi9Zsv3VS
blogPost.author: Quora

sharedContent.title:
As I prepare to teach T cell immunology this morning - I would like to reflect on the fact that one of the most influential papers in the field of T cell biology was published in the Journal of Immunology - not CNS journals.

https://t.co/DLZbmBwrY2
sharedContent.author: Jeffrey Mold

localize.full_text: トップ」ジャーナルに掲載されなかった影響力のある免疫学論文の素晴らしいスレッドです。このリストに何を加えますか？https://t.co/qJi9Zsv3VS
关于未在 "顶级 "杂志上发表的有影响力的免疫学论文的伟大主题。你想在名单上增加什么？https://t.co/qJi9Zsv3VS
關於未在 "頂級 "雜誌上發表的有影響力的免疫學論文的偉大主題。你想在名單上增加什麼？https://t.co/qJi9Zsv3VS

previous.title: Quora congratulates Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Card for winning the 2021 Sveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobel. We hosted @metrics52 for a Q&A session: https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize Who can explain the impact of their work?

localize.full_text: Quoraは、Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Cardが2021年のSveriges Riksbank Prize in Economic Sciences in Memory of Alfred Nobelを受賞したことを祝福します。We hosted @metrics52 for a Q&A session: https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize Who can explain the impact of their work?
Quora祝贺Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Card获得2021年瑞典银行经济科学奖，以纪念Alfred Nobel。我们主持了@metrics52的问答环节：https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize 谁能解释他们工作的影响？
Quora祝賀Josh Angrist, Guido W. Imbens, & David Card獲得2021年瑞典銀行經濟科學獎，以紀念Alfred Nobel。我們主持了@metrics52的問答環節：https://t.co/rHUJ0C25hI #NobelPrize 誰能解釋他們工作的影響？
